TEXT.TITLE: NEW JERSEY RESOURCES <NJR> SHARES OFFERED
TEXT.BODY: New Jersey Resources Corp said an offering of 1,300,000 common shares is underway at 19.625 dlrs per share through underwriters led by Merrill Lynch and Co Inc <MER> and E.F. Hutton Group Inc <EFH>. Reuter
